errorGettingGPS: Unable to obtain the GPS position. Do you wish to continue?

errorGettingPhoto: The photo could not be obtained. Do you wish to continue?
errorReadingGPS: Unable to obtain the GPS position
FORBID_INCORRECT_DATE_BEFORE_PUNCH: The punch entered is prior to the last punch
FORBID_INCORRECT_DATE_FUTURE: The punch date and time cannot be in the future.
GENERAL_ERROR: An error has occurred. Please report it to the support team
GENERAL_ERROR_InvalidSecurityToken: Your session has expired or you are logged in at another location. If you have any questions, please ask your administrator.
GENERAL_ERROR_MaxCurrentSessionsExceeded: The maximum number of supervisors connected has been exceeded
GENERAL_ERROR_NoPermissions: You do not have authorisation to perform this action
lblNoOverlays: Ningún usuario estará ausente durante el periodo solicitado
LOGIN_BLOCKED_ACCESS_APP: The account is permanently locked. Contact your administrator
LOGIN_GENERAL_BLOCK_ACCESS: Use of the portal is not authorised for your user
LOGIN_INVALID_APP: Access not permitted from the current application
LOGIN_INVALID_APP_ADFS: Access not permitted from the application in federated environments
LOGIN_INVALID_CLIENT_LOCATION: Access not permitted from the IP address used
LOGIN_INVALID_VALIDATION_CODE: The validation code does not match. Please try again
LOGIN_INVALID_VERSION_APP: Access not permitted from the current version of the application
LOGIN_NEED_TEMPORANY_KEY: To continue, enter the validation code sent to your email address
LOGIN_PASSWORD_EXPIRED: The password has expired and must be changed in compliance with security guidelines
LOGIN_RESULT_HIGH_STRENGHT_ERROR: The previous password does not match and/or the new password must be at least 10 characters long and contain uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters (@,#). It must not be the same as the username or previous passwords
LOGIN_RESULT_LOW_STRENGHT_ERROR: The previous password does not match and/or the new password must be at least 4 characters long and contain letters and numbers
LOGIN_RESULT_MEDIUM_STRENGHT_ERROR: The previous password does not match and/or the new password must be at least 6 characters long and contain letters and numbers. It must not be the same as the username or previous passwords
LOGIN_TEMPORANY_BLOQUED: The account is temporarily locked. Wait 10 minutes before logging in again
LOGIN_TEMPORANY_KEY_EXPIRED: Validation code has expired. To continue, enter the new validation code sent to your email account.
newVersionTitle2: Would you like to try it now?
NO_DOCUMENT_ATTACHED: You have not attached any files
NO_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE_SELECTED: You must specify the type of file you want to attach
NO_LIVE_PORTAL: You do not have any terminal assigned to the User Portal. Please contact the Support team
NO_SESSION: You are not logged on to the server
noAlerts: You do not have any pending alerts
nosurveys: There are no surveys to respond to
NOT_FOUND: Unknown error. Please inform the Support team
NOT_LICENSED: You do not have the licence to use the User Portal
PUNCH_ERROR_DELETING: The punch data could not be deleted
PUNCH_ERROR_REPEAT_IN: Repeated entries are not permitted before the time set in VisualTime
PUNCH_ERROR_REPEAT_OUT: Repeated exits are not permitted before the time set in VisualTime
PUNCH_ERROR_SAVING: The punch data could not be saved
PUNCH_NFC_TAG_NOT_FOUND: There is no zone associated with this NFC tag

REQUEST_ERROR_AnotherAbsenceExistInDate: A planned absence by hours already exists for the day selected
REQUEST_ERROR_AnotherHolidayExistInDate: A planned holiday by hours already exists for the day selected
REQUEST_ERROR_CauseRequired: To make a request, you must enter the reason for the absence
REQUEST_ERROR_ConnectionError: Connection error. Please contact the Support team
REQUEST_ERROR_CustomError: Unknown error. Please contact your administrator
REQUEST_ERROR_ExistsLockedDaysInPeriod: There are locked days in the period to schedule
REQUEST_ERROR_ExternalWorkResumePartErro: Failed to validate the request for external timesheet
REQUEST_ERROR_InHolidayPlanification: Scheduled holidays already exist for the day selected or it is a rest day
REQUEST_ERROR_NoApprovePermissions: You do not have permission to approve the request

REQUEST_ERROR_NoDeleteBecauseNotPending: Unable to delete as it does not have a pending status

REQUEST_ERROR_PlannedAbsencesOverlapped: Overlapping request for days of absence

REQUEST_ERROR_PlannedHolidaysError: Error validating request for holidays/time off by hour
REQUEST_ERROR_PlannedHolidaysOverlapped: Overlapping request for holidays/time off by hour
REQUEST_ERROR_PunchExist: A punch exists with the same date and time
REQUEST_ERROR_RequestMoveNotExist: The punch related to the request does not exist or has been modified
REQUEST_ERROR_RequestMoveTooMany: There is more than one punch related to the request
REQUEST_ERROR_RequestRepited: Repeated request (a request was made with the same request type and by the same user within the last two seconds)
REQUEST_ERROR_SqlError: Database access error. Please contact the Support team
REQUEST_ERROR_TIME_BETWEEN_PUNCHES_OVER: The time between the current punch and the previous punch exceeds the maximum permitted
REQUEST_ERROR_UserFieldNoRequestVisible: Record field not visible for requests
REQUEST_ERROR_UserFieldValueSaveError: Unable to save the record field value
